plot: A stage and a wagon heading west get separated from the rest of the wagon train thanks to Dusty. Now they must make their way to California.
plot_en: A stage and a wagon heading west get separated from the rest of the wagon train thanks to Dusty. Now they must make their way to California.
plot_es: A stage and a wagon heading west get separated from the rest of the wagon train thanks to Dusty. Now they must make their way to California.
title: Dusty's Trail
